revised_title: Arnulph Mallock: A Life of Mechanical Genius and Scientific Inquiry
tldr: Arnulph Mallock was a brilliant mechanical engineer and scientist who made significant contributions to various fields, including ballistics, optics, and microscopy. He worked on numerous problems for the government and private industries, and his inventions and experiments were often characterized by their simplicity, mechanical perfection, and accuracy. Mallock also had a keen interest in the study of materials, particularly the properties of topaz, tourmaline, and beryl.
